sentences.sentence: As an additional safeguard against weeds you can always use an underlay of heavy duty polyethylene.
sentences.translation: 作为另外一种预防杂草的防护措施，你可以一直使用一层厚重耐磨的聚乙烯底垫。

sentences.sentence: Press the seam open and carefully align the underlay before pinning the right sides together.
sentences.translation: 正面合在一起之前，先将缝线烫开并仔细地将缝的粗缝线。

sentences.sentence: Objective To explore Hydrogels underlay in preventing bed sore of orthopaedic surgery patient.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨水凝胶垫在预防骨科手术患者压疮的护理。
